title: Jack Bogle: Enough (November 20, 2008)
description: Enough was published in November 2008. Jack Bogle passed away in January 2019.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Jack Bogle, Michael Smerconish)
content:encoded: Enough was published in November 2008. Jack Bogle passed away in January 2019.
itunes:title: Jack Bogle: Enough (November 20, 2008)
itunes:author: Jack Bogle, Michael Smerconish
itunes:summary: Michael Smerconish sat down with John "Jack" C. Bogle, founder of Vanguard, on November 20, 2008 with his then-new book "Enough: True Measures of Money, Business, and Life."
itunes:subtitle: Michael Smerconish sat down with John "Jack" C. Bogle, founder of Vanguard, on November 20, 2008 with his then-new book "Enough: True Measures of Money, Business, and Life."
